title: The Tempest
brief_description: Television adaptation by John Edward Friend of Shakespeare’s tale of love and revenge, “The Tempest”. Stars Maurice Evans, Richard Burton, Roddy McDowall, Lee Remick, Tom Poston, Liam Redmond.
